name: Dinner Tonight: Grilled Baguette and Merguez Sandwich
description: Maybe chili-spiked lamb sausage—better known as Merguez, a north African specialty—isn't the most patriotic thing to grill on July 4th. Your neighbors will be out there with their all-beef patties and Oscar Meyer hot dogs, looking over the fence. But...
recipeIngredient: 1 baguette, cut into 4 lengths and sliced lengthwise
5 dried red chilies, soaked in boiling water until soft

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cucumber, tomatoes, and onions in a bowl. Add olive oil to moisten and season with salt and pepper. Splash in red wine vinegar to taste.
Prepare the harissa by blending all the ingredients in a food processor; prepare the cumin aioli by whisking the cumin into the mayonnaise until it tastes right.
